hanzi-su-wiki:
晴

Значения

Проясняться, рассеиваться; рассеивать, разгонять

Мнемоника

Проясняться. Небо чистое 青, и выглядывает солнце 日.

Варианты

暒
purpleculture_pinyin:
qíng
clear; fine (weather)
Чисто; хорошая погода)
rtega_mnemonic:
晴晴RS
X		fine weather, clear away
  • a day 日 with a blue 青 sky makes you feel young 青
 払

purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 阴
Pictophonetic: 青 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
晴朗 [ qíng lǎng ]: sunny and cloudless
晴天 [ qíng tiān ]: clear sky; sunny day
晴雨表 [ qíng yǔ biǎo ]: barometer
晴好 [ qíng hǎo ]: bright and sunny weather
放晴 [ fàng qíng ]: (of weather) to clear up
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 青 [ qīng ] nature's color; blue, green, black; young
heisig_chinese_memo: Sun and blue sky! Yep, the weather's cleared up and sunny again!
heisig_constituent: clear up, sun, day, blue, grow up, moon, flesh
heisig_story: Take the key word in its associations with the weather (unless that tempts you to include the primitive for weather, which doesn't belong here). Its elements: sun . . . blue.
koohiiStory1: Sun and blue sky! Yep, the weather´s cleared up!
koohiiStory2: When we speak of clearing up we easily think of both the sun and blue skies. But in another since to clear up is the absence of weather. And therefor the reason weather has no place in its writing.
kunYomi: は.れる、は.れ、は.れ-、-ば.れ、は.らす
jp_example_words:
素晴らしい(すばらしい): wonderful, splendid, magnificent
晴天(せいてん): fine weather
見晴らし(みはらし): view
快晴(かいせい): good weather
晴れ(はれ): clear weather
晴れる(はれる): be sunny, clear away, stop raining
jp_readingExamples: 晴らす (は.らす), 晴れる (は.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The sun is out, the sky is blue, things have begun to clear up!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look into the blue sky and imagine the clouds parting as the weather clears up and you can see the sun. Gorgeous! The beauty is so great you have to squint.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now that it's starting to clear up you can't help but laugh. "Ha (は)! Ha ha ha!" you laugh up into the sky. The sun feels great on your face, making you feel lively! And that blue sky ain't too shabby either.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Say the "ha ha ha" part out loud while you imagine the weather clearing up. It'll help you to remember the reading of this kanji.
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 亠 (крышка), 土 (земля), 日 (день), 月 (месяц), 青 (голубой)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sun (日) in the blue (青) (sky) means it's cleared up
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Sun and blue sky! Yep, the weather's cleared up and sunny again!

Liushutong characters (4)

晴字的基本解释

晴
qíng
天空中无云或云很少：晴天。晴朗。晴和。晴丽。晴爽。晴碧。晴雨表。
阴

晴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》疾盈切，平清，從。］
“夝1”的今字。亦作“暒1”。
(1)雨雪等停止，天空无云或少云。
(2)比喻泪干或泪止。

晴字的英文翻译

◎ 晴
fine

晴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　晴； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页496第39
【唐韻】疾盈切【集韻】【韻會】慈盈切，?音情。夝或作晴暒。【玉篇】雨止也，晴明也，無雲也。【史記·天官書】天晴而見景星。　又【韻補】叶慈良切。【張籍·祭韓愈詩】公因同歸還，居處各一方。中秋十六夜，魄圓天差晴。　又【說文】夝，雨而夜除星見也。【註】今俗作晴，非。

晴字的源字形

晴字的起名意思

：天空无云或云量很少，跟"阴"相对。天气晴朗。

clear
Basic explanation of words
clear
qíng
No clouds or few clouds in the sky: sunny. sunny. Qinghe. Qingli. Sunny. Qingbi. barometer.
yin
clear
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" surging sharply, calm and clear, from. ]
The present character of "夝1". Also known as "暒1".
(1) The rain and snow stop, and the sky is cloudless or less clouded.
(2) It is a metaphor for tears to dry or to stop.

fine

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　qing; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 496 page 39
[Tang Yun] Quick and full cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Kind and full cut, sound and affection. Qi or Qingyi. [Jade articles] The rain stops, the clear light is also clear, and there is no cloud. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】See Jingxing on a clear day.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Ciliang cut. 【Zhang Ji·Sacrificial Poems to Han Yu】Return the public cause and live on each side. On the 16th night of the Mid-Autumn Festival, the sky is round and sunny.　[Shuowen] Kui, rain and night except for the stars. [Note] Today's custom is fine, not.
clear
Source glyph
clear
Name meaning
: The sky has no clouds or few clouds, as opposed to "yin". it's clear.
会意字。篆书从夕(タ与月本为一字,甲骨文为半月形),从生(像草木从地面生出),合起来表示有月从地面升起之
夜。隶、楷书从目(太阳),从青(蓝天),青(qing )亦声,表示
蓝天白日为晴天。本义是夜晴,泛指天晴。
天空中无云或少云:~天|~朗」~空万里。
~好 ~和 ~空 ~天霹雳 放~ 响~ 雨过天~
晴
qíng
ト 型
晴晴
楷|
Зная слово.
Сценарий печати Congxi (Ta и Yueben - один символ, надписи на костях оракула имеют форму полумесяца), Congsheng (как трава и деревья, растущие из земли), которые вместе указывают на лунную ночь.
Ли и обычные надписи - это глаза (солнце), синее (голубое небо) и цинь (цин), что означает, что голубое небо и день солнечные.
Первоначальное значение - Ецин, что обычно относится к Тяньцину.
На небе нет облаков или мало облаков: ~ Тянь | ~ Ланг ~ ~ пустые мили.
~ Хорошо ~ И ~ Пусто ~ Небо гремит ~ Громко ~ Дождь проходит по небу ~
Чисто
ト тип
Хару Хару
Кай |
qíng
I прил.
солнечный, ясный (о погоде); чистый, безоблачный (о небе); залитый солнцем (напр. о горах)
天晴了 разведрило
晴旦 ясное (безоблачное) утро
II сущ.
ясная погода; вёдро
祈晴 просить хорошей погоды, молиться о прекращении дождей
晴阴 ясная и пасмурная погода
Radicals: 日, 青  (sun, blue)
Meaning Mnemonic
The sun is out, the sky is blue, things have begun to clear up!
Look into the blue sky and imagine the clouds parting as the weather clears up and you can see the sun. Gorgeous! The beauty is so great you have to squint.
Reading Mnemonic
Now that it's starting to clear up you can't help but laugh. "Ha (は)! Ha ha ha!" you laugh up into the sky. The sun feels great on your face, making you feel lively! And that blue sky ain't too shabby either.
Say the "ha ha ha" part out loud while you imagine the weather clearing up. It'll help you to remember the reading of this kanji.
